item.title: Scavenger hunts, Christmas mass, Cajun-fried turkey: Capitol Hill's favorite holiday traditions
item.description: House lawmakers on both sides of the aisle agree that the holidays are a time for family, friends, and showing people that they care.

item.title: Nearly 20 states sue HHS over declaration to restrict gender transition treatment for minors
item.description: A group of 19 Democrat-led states filed a lawsuit against the Trump administration over a declaration to restrict gender transition treatments for min...

item.title: Trump takes NORAD Santa calls with children, praises 'clean, beautiful coal' and 'high-IQ' person
item.description: President Donald Trump told kids they're "high IQ" and praised "clean, beautiful coal" during Christmas Eve NORAD Santa tracker calls from Mar-a-Lago ...

item.title: DOJ discovers more than 1M potential Epstein records, further delaying file release
item.description: Jeffrey Epstein documents review could take weeks as Justice Department says it discovered over a million additional files from FBI and prosecutors.

item.title: Pentagon to send 350 National Guard troops to New Orleans as violent crime surges ahead of major events
item.description: More than 300 national Guard troops will assist law enforcement in New Orleans through Mardi Gras as officials work to combat rising violent crime.
